title: YMDUCH Women's Sexy Sleeveless One Shoulder Ruffle High Split Party Evening Long Formal Dress

Beautiful and intimate details: the invisible zipper on the back makes it easy to put on and take off. The position of the split ends is in the middle of the thighs. When you walk, you can perfectly show your legs.

Fashion design: One shoulder has a lotus leaf design, which can perfectly block the thick arm. The low-cut and ruffled design can make you more sexy and charming. There is a split design on the thighs, which can show your slender legs. The skirt is exactly the length of the floor, showing the elegant and dignified temperament of the dress.

The ruffled mopping evening dress can be applied to any formal occasions, such as parties, parties, dinner dress,cocktail parties, weddings, bridesmaid dresses, bride portraits, graduation ceremonies, birthday parties and other important occasions.
